content: The moon is a natural satellite that orbits around the Earth. It is the fifth-largest moon in the solar system and is the only celestial body other than Earth that humans have visited. content: Facebook LLaMa is a large language model developed by Meta. It is designed to help researchers in the field of AI advance their work. LLaMa is a foundational model that can be fine-tuned for various tasks. It is available in different sizes and is aimed at democratizing access to large language models by making them more accessible to researchers who may not have access to extensive infrastructure. LLaMa has the potential to generate creative text, solve mathematical theorems, predict protein structures, and answer reading comprehension questions. However, there is still ongoing research to address issues such as bias, toxicity, and misinformation in large language models. To ensure responsible use, access to LLaMa is granted on a case-by-case basis to academic researchers, government organizations, civil society, and industry research laboratories.
